name: Fiasco: Big Cats
description: This playset is an accessory for the Fiasco role-playing game. Inspired by the documentary series Tiger King, this playset explores the wild world of privately owned independent zoos and the larger-than-life figures who operate them. In this tiger-eat-tiger industry, you'll have to accumulate exotic animals, dedicated followers, desperate lovers and bitter enemies to crown yourself king of the backyard jungle.  When the only thing more bloodthirsty than the animals are the people...you know you're in for a fiasco.
